data.message: Eminem is one of the greatest rappers out there he knows how to spit it out know matter what mood he is in  he goes with the flow i a lot of people don't like his last album but I love it he can be 3 different people at once Marshall slim shady or eminem and to me they are all good but each there own which makes his music great so if you you don't listen to each one carefully you won't get any of it
